channel.title: Client Autoupdater BÃ©ta
channel.description:
heh, almost all of my threads end with "BÃ©ta" :D
Well, i was at my fathers place this weekend so i couldn't continue FScript. So i felt like doing something else ;) I tried some delphi and some java. Now after i was done with the java i decided to start a new project, an autoupdater for clients. Now my java isn't very good so most of my work is based on the client editing tuts i could find. The updater removes traps and sets a prefix. I've succesfully tested it for #355 and #363 so it should work next update as well i hope. I'm posting this here because 1 its still a beta and 2 i don't wan't to affect the forums in any negative way (=jagex :()
Edit: before i forget, you place this in the map with the deob (where client.java is located), open it, press start
Edit2: heh, update: you can now fix the chatfilter and i added a small renamer, doesnt rename much yet though, about 3 variables and a method :D
Edit3: I've slightly expanded the renamer with 2 variables :D Enjoy
